Uses of Interface
edu.rit.pj.cluster.JobSchedulerRef

Packages that use JobSchedulerRef
edu.rit.pj.cluster Package edu.rit.pj.cluster contains client and server programs for message passing parallel programming using Parallel Java (PJ). 
edu.rit.pj.cluster.test Package edu.rit.pj.cluster.test contains unit test programs for package edu.rit.pj.cluster. 
 

Uses of JobSchedulerRef in edu.rit.pj.cluster
 

Classes in edu.rit.pj.cluster that implement JobSchedulerRef
 class JobScheduler
          Class JobScheduler is the main program for the PJ Job Scheduler Daemon process for a parallel computer.
 class JobSchedulerProxy
          Class JobSchedulerProxy provides a proxy object for sending messages to a PJ job scheduler process.
